last_episode_to_air.name: Unmasked
last_episode_to_air.overview: Terry recalls when he endangered a child by revealing his identity to him, which led to the child being abducted.

name: Batman Beyond
overview: As new villains overrun Gotham City of the future, the aging Bruce Wayne hangs up the cape of the once invincible Batman. But when troubled teenager Terry McGinnis stumbles upon the Dark Knight's secret, a new alliance is forged. And a triumphant new Batman is born.

episodes.name: Rebirth (1)
episodes.overview: Teenager Terry McGinnis asks a retired Bruce Wayne for help in the wake of his father's murder.

episodes.name: Rebirth (2)
episodes.overview: Bruce and Terry team up to fight Derek Powers, and Bruce begins mentoring Terry to fill his superhero shoes.

episodes.name: Black Out
episodes.overview: Terry must deal with a dangerous shape-shifter named Inque, and the experience teaches him that he's not fully prepared to become the next Batman.

episodes.name: Golem
episodes.overview: After being pushed around by classmates and by his father, Willie Watt gains the power to take matters into his own hands through a GLM construction robot.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: Mr. Freeze is given a new body by scientists, but it soon breaks down, sending him on a rampage.

episodes.name: Heroes
episodes.overview: The Terrific Trio, a band of new superheroes, arrive in town and make Batman feel insignificant until he uncovers their true nefarious motives.

episodes.name: Shriek
episodes.overview: A sound-waves researcher transforms into Shriek, a villain who can control sound, and Batman must thwart his evil plans.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Hand
episodes.overview: Terry meets a girl with a buried secret and feels like she's his kindred spirit. Meanwhile, Batman must battle a gang of villains who dress like playing cards.

episodes.name: The Winning Edge
episodes.overview: A new drug leads student athletes to commit violent crimes, and Bane is the likely drug supplier.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.overview: People begin committing crimes for Spellbinder while under hypnosis, so Batman must figure out a way to unmask this sly villain.

episodes.name: Disappearing Inque
episodes.overview: Inque breaks free and sets out to murder Batman and Bruce.

episodes.name: A Touch of Curar√©
episodes.overview: An assassin goes after Commissioner Gordon's husband.

episodes.name: Ascension
episodes.overview: Derek Powers' alter ego Blight is revealed, so his son takes over his corporation and asks Batman to track down his dad, who's on the lam.

episodes.name: Splicers
episodes.overview: A mad scientist gives animal characteristics to humans in order to breed a crew of teenage minions, so Terry goes undercover to stop him.

episodes.name: Earth Mover
episodes.overview: A vengeful creature returns to Gotham to get his daughter back from the man who transformed him into a monster.

episodes.name: Joyride
episodes.overview: Batman tries to halt a riotous gang bent on destroying Gotham.

episodes.name: Lost Soul
episodes.overview: A dead villain's soul takes possession of the Batsuit and tries to take over his grandson's brain.

episodes.name: Hidden Agenda
episodes.overview: Terry tries to protect Max from Carter, but Max uncovers Carter and Terry's true identities.

episodes.name: Bloodsport
episodes.overview: A skilled hunter seeks a challenge, so he comes to Gotham to target Batman.

episodes.name: Once Burned
episodes.overview: Terry's ex-girlfriend goes back to her old criminal ways.

episodes.name: Hooked Up
episodes.overview: Max gets obsessed with a virtual-reality world being run by Spellbinder.

episodes.name: Rats
episodes.overview: Batman watches over Dana, who has a new admirer: a teenage loner who's fond of rats.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: A young psychic reaches out to Batman and implores him to rescue her from a mysterious organization.

episodes.name: Revenant
episodes.overview: Terry's peers believe the halls of their school are haunted.

episodes.name: Babel
episodes.overview: Shriek comes back and terrorizes Gotham, vowing to stop only if Batman surrenders to him.

episodes.name: Terry's Friend Dates a Robot
episodes.overview: Terry's pal Howard goes out with an unruly android.

episodes.name: Eyewitness
episodes.overview: Barbara Gordon is convinced Terry killed Mad Stan, and is ready to reveal Bruce Wayne's secret identity along with her own.

episodes.name: Final Cut
episodes.overview: Gotham faces a bomb threat in the wake of Curare's return to town.

episodes.name: The Last Resort
episodes.overview: Terry's classmates get sent to a strict boarding school, which resembles a prison from the Middle Ages.

episodes.name: Armory
episodes.overview: The dad of one of Terry's pals commits crimes with help from a suit equipped with superpowers.

episodes.name: Sneak Peek
episodes.overview: A reporter discovers Terry's alter ego and threatens to expose him on TV.

episodes.name: The Eggbaby
episodes.overview: Terry has to multitask and go after a group of robbers while caring for a computerized egg baby for a school assignment.

episodes.name: Zeta
episodes.overview: Batman tries to assist a military robot that no longer wants to kill.

episodes.name: Plague
episodes.overview: Batman teams up with Stalker to catch a crafty villain.

episodes.name: April Moon
episodes.overview: Batman fights a group of bionically enhanced villains.

episodes.name: Sentries of the Last Cosmos
episodes.overview: Batman faces off with a group of villains who resemble video-game characters.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: A vigilante seeks justice for bullied teens.

episodes.name: Where's Terry?
episodes.overview: Bruce partners with Max to rescue Terry, who's been captured by Shriek.

episodes.name: Ace in the Hole
episodes.overview: After Ace vanishes, Batman pieces together clues to a dogfighting ring.

episodes.name: King's Ransom
episodes.overview: Batman faces the Royal Flush Gang, who kidnap Paxton Powers.

episodes.name: Untouchable
episodes.overview: Terry looks into some robberies committed by a man wearing a force-field suit, and he meets an intriguing girl who lives in a bubble.

episodes.name: Inqueling
episodes.overview: A wounded Inque seeks help from her long-lost daughter and sees much of herself in the young woman.

episodes.name: Big Time
episodes.overview: Terry's old pal gets out of juvenile hall and wants Terry to walk on the wild side again.

episodes.name: Out of the Past
episodes.overview: Talia returns to see Bruce, who's surprised at how youthful-looking she is.

episodes.name: Speak No Evil
episodes.overview: Batman assists a genetically altered gorilla, who wants to track down his abductors.

episodes.name: The Call (1)
episodes.overview: The Justice League recruits Batman to help uncover a traitor within the group.

episodes.name: The Call (2)
episodes.overview: Batman searches for a traitor in the Justice League.

episodes.name: Betrayal
episodes.overview: Big Time uses Terry in his revenge scheme against mobsters.

episodes.name: Curse of the Kobra (1)
episodes.overview: Terry meets the Kobra organization's dangerous leader.

episodes.name: Curse of the Kobra (2)
episodes.overview: Terry tries to thwart Kobra's plans.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: Batman must save Zeta, who has been booby-trapped with a bomb.

episodes.name: Unmasked
episodes.overview: Terry recalls when he endangered a child by revealing his identity to him, which led to the child being abducted.
